comment.author: 90893976@N08
comment._content: My grandfather was an MP in 1127th that guarded Maj Gen Wolfe from Jan 46-Jan 47 in Nagoya. I'd be interested in talking to anyone that was there/may have known him or may have heard stories from their parents/grandparents/etc. I have a few old photos from the time there as well. Please feel free to contact me at chilly@intercom.net if you may have info. Thank you.

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: More on the aircraft here: www.pacificwrecks.com/aircraft/b-17/41-24353.html If the date on the photo is correct, this photo was taken shortly before this B-17 was scrapped at Tacloban Airfield, Philippines in April 1946.
